outputs.output_descr: The reform of the System of Social Services in Ukraine is supported. the main objective is: to explore opportunities for future development interventions to be implemented by UNDP Ukraine aimed at supporting the Government of Ukraine in the reform of the system of social services through (i) sharing the best international experiences of transition country/new EU member-state in undertaking similar reforms and (ii) the development of the respective Project Document.

project_descr: Support to Reforming the System of Social Services in Ukraine
project_title: Support to Reforming the System of Social Services
